I couldn't get this to download with Bitspirit it kept saying "bad torrent file" and it appeared to be empty with no trackers / files. Unfortunately there hasn't been a recent upgrade for Bitspirit, but it works fine with ur older torrent uploades pls suggest

- Use Cyan|Red or Blue|Red 3d glasses with Stereoscopic player or Powerdvd12

- Use Stereoscopic player if you do not have 3d tv

- Use Cyberlink Powerdvd12 if you do not have 3d tv ( http://www.cyberlink.com/products/powerdvd/overview_en_US.html?&r=1 )

- Can be used by either 3d software or 3d hardware to view

- Works on 3d tvs with active shutter 3d glasses

- Can be watched on a non-3d laptop by using Cyan|Red or Blue|Red 3d glasses with Stereoscopic player or Po

its a 3d movie u need 3d glasses  to watch it in sing screen :( :( :(

If anyone wants to watch a SBS 3D movie in 2D (God knows why you wouldn't just download a 2D version). 1, Download NVIDIA 3D Vision Video Player (It is free from the NVIDIA website). 2, Open the Movie in Side by Side mode. 3, Click View -> Viewing Method -> Monoscopic (or press F4)

Good quality works with active glasses but this side by side is pissing me after 5 minutes 
Thanks anyway

got it working with A.C Rayan and samsung tv problem was media player was set @ 720p but 3d needs at least 1280x720p to show single format.

In acryan change settings video/video system 1080p
I would guess the same for any other media player 
Then go to Samsung picture/3d mode and change picture to side by side and for some reason it makes it single

All working excellent thanks Yify
